name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Unique identifier for this copy of the Consent Statement.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Unique identifier for this copy of the Consent Statement.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Unique identifier for this copy of the Consent Statement.

name: $status
desc: Returns: Indicates the current state of this Consent resource.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates the current state of this Consent resource.

name: $scope
desc: Returns: A selector of the type of consent being presented: Privacy, Treatment,  or Research.  This list is now extensible.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A selector of the type of consent being presented: Privacy, Treatment,  or Research.  This list is now extensible.

name: $category
desc: Returns: A classification of the type of consents found in the statement. This element supports indexing and retrieval of consent statements.

name: $addcategory
desc: A classification of the type of consents found in the statement. This element supports indexing and retrieval of consent statements.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A classification of the type of consents found in the statement. This element supports indexing and retrieval of consent statements.

name: $patient
desc: Returns: The patient/healthcare consumer to whom this consent applies.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The patient/healthcare consumer to whom this consent applies.

name: $dateTime
desc: Returns: Date and time the consent instance was agreed to.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Date and time the consent instance was agreed to.

name: $performer
desc: Returns: Either the Grantor, which is the entity responsible for granting the rights listed in a Consent Directive or the Grantee, which is the entity responsible for complying with the Consent Directive, including any obligations or limitations on authorizations and enforcement of prohibitions.

name: $addperformer
desc: Either the Grantor, which is the entity responsible for granting the rights listed in a Consent Directive or the Grantee, which is the entity responsible for complying with the Consent Directive, including any obligations or limitations on authorizations and enforcement of prohibitions.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Either the Grantor, which is the entity responsible for granting the rights listed in a Consent Directive or the Grantee, which is the entity responsible for complying with the Consent Directive, including any obligations or limitations on authorizations

name: $organization
desc: Returns: The organization that manages the consent, and the framework within which it is executed.

name: $addorganization
desc: The organization that manages the consent, and the framework within which it is executed.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The organization that manages the consent, and the framework within which it is executed.

name: $sourceAttachment
desc: Returns: The source on which this consent statement is based. The source might be a scanned original paper form.

name: $addsourceAttachment
desc: The source on which this consent statement is based. The source might be a scanned original paper form.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The source on which this consent statement is based. The source might be a scanned original paper form.

name: $sourceReference
desc: Returns: A reference to a consent that links back to such a source, a reference to a document repository (e.g. XDS) that stores the original consent document.

name: $addsourceReference
desc: A reference to a consent that links back to such a source, a reference to a document repository (e.g. XDS) that stores the original consent document.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A reference to a consent that links back to such a source, a reference to a document repository (e.g. XDS) that stores the original consent document.

name: $policy
desc: Returns: The references to the policies that are included in this consent scope. Policies may be organizational, but are often defined jurisdictionally, or in law.

name: $addpolicy
desc: The references to the policies that are included in this consent scope. Policies may be organizational, but are often defined jurisdictionally, or in law.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The references to the policies that are included in this consent scope. Policies may be organizational, but are often defined jurisdictionally, or in law.

name: $policyRule
desc: Returns: A reference to the specific base computable regulation or policy.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A reference to the specific base computable regulation or policy.

name: $verification
desc: Returns: Whether a treatment instruction (e.g. artificial respiration yes or no) was verified with the patient, his/her family or another authorized person.

name: $addverification
desc: Whether a treatment instruction (e.g. artificial respiration yes or no) was verified with the patient, his/her family or another authorized person.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Whether a treatment instruction (e.g. artificial respiration yes or no) was verified with the patient, his/her family or another authorized person.

name: $provision
desc: Returns: An exception to the base policy of this consent. An exception can be an addition or removal of access permissions.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An exception to the base policy of this consent. An exception can be an addition or removal of access permissions.
